OUTLINE : This randomize , control , pilot study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I ( exercise program ) : Patients participate exercise program comprising cardiorespiratory ( walk treadmill ) resistance train 1 hour , 3 time weekly 12 week . - Arm II ( control ) : Patients undergo intervention . In arm , patient complete questionnaire regard general health , mood , work attendance , physical activity start study treatment every 3 week 12 week .
